html:
According to YourStory, Trell Experiences Pvt Ltd, an India-based lifestyle community commerce platform, is in talks to secure USD100 million in venture funding round led by Amazon and other investors

Reportedly, the transaction could value Trell Experiences between USD600 and USD800 million.

Deal In Brief

Deal Value (US$ Million)100
Deal TypeVenture Finance
Sub-CategoryStart-up
Deal StatusRumour: 2021-10-23

Deal Participants

Target (Company)Trell Experiences Pvt Ltd
Acquirer 1 (Company)Amazon.com, Inc.
Acquirer 2 (Company)Undisclosed Investor(s)

Deal Rationale
